sorular.soru: What is the speed limit here at 9:00 PM?

feedback.metin: Here are two signs indicating a speed limit. Below these signs there are supplementary plates indicating the time of day the speed limit applies. At 9:00 PM, the speed limit is 120 km/h.

sorular.soru: How fast are you allowed to drive here?

feedback.metin: The green line on the road axis indicates that you are driving on an autoweg. On autowegen, the speed limit is 100 km/h, unless signage indicates otherwise.
